snippet.title: Trade or Die trailer
snippet.description:
Steam-page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2168000/Trade_or_Die/
My website: https://notovia.net/
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/notoviaofficial

In this horror-themed stock market simulator you (the player) have made some mistakes and owe money to some bad people. You must make enough money by trading in the stock market to pay your debt in time. Buy, sell and short shares in fictional companies, earn dividends, pay taxes and follow the in-game news for possible hints on what to invest in. You have one night to pay back your debt and any taxes on the profits you make. If the you fail to make enough money in time you will get murdered in cold blood. No previous experience in stock market required.

Created by Notovia. Notovia is best known for the indie horror series I'm on Observation Duty. 

Music by Karl Casey @White Bat Audio . The song in the trailer is called Infernal Sky.
